item.title: Late Night Event
item.content:encoded:
Overnight Team + Strut your Stuff

led to a 4 turn avoid the squee event. Didn't see it posted for overnight events so heres some intel.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: Squee is a side effect of (+1 str&range) billycon-event boni, so some fun with minigame but not much help from squee skills while :)

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: Yeah, the squee skills are used for backstage. Though not much use after you've got one level, so I tend to just go as long as I can, and hope to make it just so I don't have to waste a change of clothes -_-

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: Bro, just look at http://bvs.wikidot.com/billycon:events column "bonuses". U'll see that at tab "Backstage 1" level 1+ of Crossplay/ The Angels / Glomping will give u 1 more roll in certain event :D

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded:
as far as I can tell the XP you gain from the squee is in useless skills that do absolutely nothing… can someone confirm this or give an example of a use for their skills?

Specifically:
Crossplay
The angels
Glomping

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded:
"Hiding Place: Under A Chair" And options for "Make a Break For" were "the line" and "the stairwell".

I've played squee at first today so I think there are some random/changeable round to round variants of those places like in real hunt ^_^

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded:
If you go undercover, you get (mine was 0 crossplay exp, 0 turns. I bailed out early):

Gone Undercover

Cornered, you remove your costume. The Squee stop, look around as if you have vanished, and scuttle off in search of new prey.

You don't have it in you to try to pull that again today, but at least you avoided getting Glomped, right?

You got _ XP!
(_ Turns)
You are now Undercover!

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded:
When I tried to use Dig In, and got glomped (I'm guessing due to being over 100?), I got (in dark red text box):

You shrink from their gaze, but they see you! In a flash, they converge in an endless floodâ€¦
You have been Glomped!

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: Oficial forums says that if u used "Go Undercover", u still can "Strut Your Stuff" if u'll "Change Clothes".

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: A three hour panel/ 8 turn avoid the Squee will give 210 XP
